thread.section_title: Exceptional Villas Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Exceptional Villas | www.exceptionalvillas.com
thread.title: M. Goodman
thread.title_full: Exceptional Villas reviewed by M. Goodman

author: M. Goodman
title: M. Goodman
text: Had a great experience with Yvonne and Julie at Exceptional Villas. Rented a villa sight unseen in Barbados. It was everything they said it was going to be, no unpleasant surprises that can happen with online rentals. The ladies were super professional, got back to me quickly, took care of transfers, reservations, tennis lessons ect... I would highly recommend.
